title: Maasai Mara
description: Known to be one of the most spectacular game reserves

title: Fourteen Falls
description: This site contains fourteen beautiful waterfalls that have abundant activities and tours

title: Diani Beach
description: Bask in the tropical weather, and enjoy a mesmerizing view of the palm-lined beach, and untarnished white sands

title: Lamu Island
description: Travel back in time as you explore the oldest inhabited settlement in Kenya

title: Wasini Island
description: The small island of Wasini lies in Southeastern coast and is known for its ultramarine waters, and extensive coral reefs

title: Samburu National Reserve
description: Known for its popular game reserve where tourist can enjoy a rejuvenating stay, and witness the extensive wildlife

title: Malindi
description: Malindi is a popular resort town that lures tourists to explore its historical monuments, pristine beaches, and extensive corals

title: Mombasa
description: This city is also famous for its beaches, corals, old monuments, and bustling street markets

title: Mt. Kenya National Park
description: Mt. Kenya is the second highest peak in Kenya, and also a UNESCO World Heritage Site

title: Lake Victoria
description: Passing through 3 African countries namely Kenya, Uganda, and Tanzania, Lake Victoria is the largest lake in the whole continent

title: Amboseli National Park
description: Adorned by the gigantic Mt. Kilimanjaro, Amboseli National Park is one of the top places to visit in Kenya for wildlife enthusiasts

title: Lake Turkana
description: Lake Turkana is the most important everlasting desert lake on the planet

title: Tsavo National Park
description: National parks of Tsavo East and Tsavo West Collectively make up Kenya’s largest protected wildlife space

title: Lake Nakuru National Park
description: Lake Nakuru National Park nestles on the ground of the Great Rift Valley and is known for its huge soda lake.

title: Hell’s Gate National Park
description: Hell’s Gate permits strolling safaris and has designated trails for mountain climbing and mountain biking
